translations: v.强烈谴责，怒斥（fulminate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: They all fulminated against the new curriculum.
sentences.translation: 他们都对新课程表强烈不满。

sentences.sentence: Bill O’Reilly, a popular cable pundit, fulminated about “Tiller the Baby-Killer” on at least 29 of his shows, according to Salon, an online magazine.
sentences.translation: 根据一份在线杂志“沙龙”所说，比尔-奥莱利，一个受欢迎的电视评论人，曾在他的节目中怒斥“蒂勒是婴儿杀手”至少29次之多。
